snippet: Abbott Laboratories said it reached an agreement with the federal government and most states to pay $1.6 billion in connection with its marketing of the anti-seizure drug Depakote.
abstract: Abbott Laboratories says it reached an agreement with the federal government and most states to pay $1.6 billion in connection with its illegal marketing of the anti-seizure drug Depakote.

byline.original: By MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT and KATIE THOMAS

lead_paragraph: Abbott Laboratories said it reached an agreement with the federal government and most states to pay $1.6 billion in connection with its marketing of the anti-seizure drug Depakote.

headline.seo: Abbott to Pay $1.6 Billion Over Illegal Marketing
